items.sentence: I thought that I should try to look my best.
I spent that Saturday afternoon watching TV.
If you have any questions, feel free to ask.
This pond doesn't go dry even in the summer.
Mt. Fuji is covered with snow in the winter.
Even if it should rain, I'll leave tomorrow.
The radius of the Earth is 6,400 kilometers.
Could you tell me which bus goes to the zoo?
The concert started about three minutes ago.
I'm getting really tired of waiting for Tom.
I started reading the book that Tom lent me.
It was cheaper than I'd thought it would be.
Translating this sentence will be very easy.
Tom isn't sure that he can do it by himself.
Tom got cookie crumbs all over his keyboard.
Tom needs to get his head out of the clouds.
Tom said he hasn't seen Mary in a long time.
It was nice of Tom to lend you his umbrella.
I suspect Tom and Mary both want to do that.
I suspect Tom and Mary have never done that.
